extendedInfo.description: With hydraulic fracturing and horizontal drilling making headlines, oil prices still in flux, and other energy related trends impacting your clientsâ business, itâs essential for you to clearly understand the issues so you can impart that knowledge to your clients. Join leading experts and senior professionals for a comprehensive look at the financial, legislative and political issues facing the oil and gas industry.Keywords: aicpa, cpa2biz, Janet Clark, oil prices, PDI, Marathon Oil Corp, Hydraulic Fracturing, Enterprise Risk Management.
